content: I want to know some suggestions from @all of you about the design for new logo and the github icon too. I designed a octopus holding the . Updating it and I will send it soon.

Several notes about the logo:

  • it does not have to be a Z
  • or within a circle
  • can be a different shade of green than now (if ocean theme, bluish or green-bluish)
  • good to be connected to 'chat' or 'team' or even better 'team chat'
  • can have an octopus or not
  • should be distinctive and simple
